title: 8th Sem Special topic
content:
So, we need to select three special topics for 6 credits. LLM was not included in this list, but it is being offered. Seniors, please let me know which ones are relatively easier. I have already taken RM ST and DIOT in my 7th sem .

comments.body: Same situation, I'm picking RL, cloud security and automative cybersecurity

Research Methodology is pretty easy and straightforward. Most of the course does not require any kind of memorization. There's also notes (made by me) [here](https://github.com/abaksy/pesu-cse-notes/tree/main/pdf/RM).
Thank You but I have already taken it in my 7th sem do you have any idea about topics except for RM,ST and Iot
ohh like did you ask someone about the courses ?
Sorry, we didn't have the other ones so no idea

It was more of an elimination method, no way I was taking ethical hacking after the scene last sem, Project Management is a DIS course so was left with these choices. It was between LLM and cybersecurity for me.
It was pretty chill in 7th sem, easy scoring.
